title.en: Aspiration Prayer of the Ultimate Definitive Meaning

text.en: In all my lifetimes, may the three trainings, the three precepts, and all my tantric commitments be completely pure without blemishes!
text.en-trans: kyewa küntu lab sum dom sum damtsik tamché kyönmé yangdak dzokpar shok

text.en: May my bodily postures, yogic gaze, and all of the extremely fine vital winds and mind internally cease, naturally cease, perpetually cease, and greatly cease!
text.en-trans: lüné tatang shintu zang zhing lungsem tamché ngang gi gak shing rang gak ten gak chenpor gakpar shok

text.en: May the entirety of ordinary awareness swiftly cease so that all beings may benefit from swiftly realizing pristine awareness!
text.en-trans: namshé tamché nyur gak yeshe nyur tok semchen kün gyi dönjé shok

text.en: May ordinary awareness as the universal ground swiftly cease so that the great bliss which is pristine awareness as the universal ground magnificently pervading space is swiftly realized!
text.en-trans: künzhi namshé nyurdu gak né künzhi yeshe dechen khakhyab chenpo nyur tob shok

text.en: May the pristine awareness which arises extrinsically swiftly come about so that the naturally manifesting pristine awareness magnificently pervading space is swiftly realized!
text.en-trans: zhen jung yeshe nyurdu kyé né rangjung yeshe khakhyab chenpo nyur tob shok

text.en: May all conceptual imputations swiftly cease so that all beings may benefit from swiftly realizing what is perfectly established!
text.en-trans: küntak tamché nyurdu gak né yongdrub nyur tob semchen kün gyi dönjé shok

text.en: May all incidental obscurations swiftly cease so that beings as vast as space may benefit from swiftly realizing their enlightened essence!
text.en-trans: lobur drima tamché nyur gak deshek nyingpo nyur tob khakhyab drowé dönjé shok

text.en: May all external and internal obscurations swiftly cease so that passing beyond into the other supreme state of a primordial Buddha is swiftly realized!
text.en-trans: chi nang drima tamché nyur gak zhen chok parol dangpö sangye nyur tob shok

text.en: May all enduring defilements totally cease so that all beings may benefit from realizing every quality of the Middle Way!
text.en-trans: tamé kyön kün rab gak umé yönten kün tob semchen kün gyi dönjé shok

text.en: May all defiled incidental phenomena swiftly cease so that the genuine nature of phenomena which is great bliss beyond enumeration is realized!
text.en-trans: lobur chö kyi kyön kün nyur gak chönyi nyukmé dechen drang yé tobpar shok

text.en: May all defilements of discursive thinking totally cease so that the Great Seal of non-discursive pristine awareness is swiftly realized!
text.en-trans: nampar tokpé kyön kün rab gak mi tok yeshe chakgya chenpo nyur tob shok

text.en: May attachment to transference of the vital winds and mind totally cease so that the great bliss of the un-subsiding Great Seal is swiftly realized!
text.en-trans: lungsem powé chakpa rab gak pomé chakchen dewa chenpo nyur tob shok

text.en: May Buddhahood which resides from the very beginning beyond enumeration as the qualities of the ultimate dimension of reality be swiftly realized for the final benefit of oneself!
text.en-trans: döndam chökü yönten drang dé döné zhukpé sangye nyur tob rangdön tarchin shok

text.en: May the marvelous qualities of the tangible dimension of relative reality completely come about in order to benefit beings as vast as space!
text.en-trans: kündzob zukkü yönten mejung dzokpar kyé né khakhyab drowé dönjé shok
